name: Rock'em All
description:
Rock'em All

You are a sphere-man who loves ROCK'N ROLL, and a lead guitar in a band. One day, as you are playing in a bar, audience asked you to stop playing what you love!

You couldn't let rock music slowly fade away and die, you need to keep your band and your music alive!

Keep your band alive by shooting enemies with your gu"itar"n!

Collect points to unlock new tracks! Remember, your music is your weapon!

Rock'em All is a 3D topdown shooter where you use the power of your band's songs to kill your enemies.

You change your songs to change the power of your guitar. This power determined by the BPM (beats per minute) of your songs. 

Slower songs (low BPM rate) deal more damage, but you fire them less frequent.
Faster songs (high BPM rate) deal less damage, but you fire them more frequent.

Credits:

Semih Sevimli - Developer, Level Design

Martín Bâtard - Composer, Sound Design
